frontmatter.title: Module 1: Intro to Python and Jupyter Notebooks
frontmatter.description: In this module, you will learn how to write basic Python code and how to use your Jupyter Notebooks.

frontmatter.title: Module 2: Setting up your working environment with conda
frontmatter.description: This module will teach you how to organize your environments using conda

frontmatter.title: Module 3: Development best-practices - testing
frontmatter.description: In the module, you will learn about code testing and pytest.

frontmatter.title: Module 4: Pandas and Jupyter Notebooks for datacleaing
frontmatter.description: In this module, you will learn to do some basic data cleaning with Pandas and Jupyter Notebooks.

frontmatter.title: References and Resources
frontmatter.description: Here are scripts to re-use and links to additional references and topics to learn.
